trans-unit.source: Non-HTML documents. The DOM implementation must have information that says which attributes are of type ID. Attributes with the name "id" are not of type ID unless so defined in the document's DTD. The id attribute is defined to be of ID type in the common cases of XHTML, XUL, and other. Implementations that do not know whether attributes are of type ID or not are expected to return null.
trans-unit.target: 非HTML文档。DOM实现必须具有说明哪些属性为ID类型的信息。除非在文档的DTD中定义，否则名称为“ id”的属性的类型不是ID。该 id 属性被定义为ID类型在共同案件XHTML，XUL，和其它。不知道属性是否为ID类型的实现应返回 null 。

trans-unit.source: Note: If a <div>, <span>, or <noembed> node has a child text node that includes the characters (&), (<), or (>), innerHTML returns these characters as the HTML entities "&", "<" and ">" respectively. Use Node.textContent to get a raw copy of these text nodes' contents.

trans-unit.source: Note: Some controlling user agents may allow the user to initiate a default presentation connection and select a presentation display with the same user gesture. For example, the browser chrome could allow the user to pick a display from a menu, or allow the user to tap on an Near Field Communications (NFC) enabled display. In this case, when the controlling user agent asks for permission while starting a presentation, the browser could offer that display as the default choice, or consider the gesture as granting permission for the display and bypass display selection entirely.
trans-unit.target: 注意：一些控制用户代理可能允许用户启动默认演示文稿连接并选择具有相同用户手势的演示文稿显示。例如，浏览器镶边可以允许用户从菜单中选择显示，或者允许用户点击启用了近场通信（NFC）的显示。在这种情况下，当控制用户代理在开始演示时请求许可时，浏览器可以将该显示提供为默认选择，或将手势视为授予该显示许可，并完全绕开显示选择。

trans-unit.source: Note: A screen lock is web application dependent. If application A is locked to landscape and application B is locked to portrait, switching from application A to B or B to A will not fire an orientationchange event because both applications will keep the orientation they had.

trans-unit.source: Note: As you can see from the code above, document.cookie is an accessor property with native setter and getter functions, and consequently is not a data property with a value: what you write is not the same as what you read, everything is always mediated by the JavaScript interpreter.

trans-unit.source: Note: Based on the current implementation, browsers won't actually read the bytestream of a file to determine its media type. It is assumed based on the file extension; a PNG image file renamed to .txt would give "text/plain" and not "image/png". Moreover, file.type is generally reliable only for common file types like images, HTML documents, audio and video. Uncommon file extensions would return an empty string. Client configuration (for instance, the Windows Registry) may result in unexpected values even for common types. Developers are advised not to rely on this property as a sole validation scheme.
trans-unit.target: 注意：根据当前的实现，浏览器实际上不会读取文件的字节流来确定其媒体类型。假定基于文件扩展名；一个重命名为.txt的PNG图片文件将显示“ text / plain ”而不是“ image / png ”。此外， file.type 通常仅对常见文件类型（例如图像，HTML文档，音频和视频）可靠。不常见的文件扩展名将返回一个空字符串。客户端配置（例如，Windows注册表）可能会导致意外值，即使对于常见类型也是如此。建议开发人员不要将此属性作为唯一的验证方案。

trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that in our vertical line example, the Y position still referenced an integer gridline position—if it hadn't, we would see pixels with half coverage at the endpoints (but note also that this behavior depends on the current lineCap style whose default value is butt; you may want to compute consistent strokes with half-pixel coordinates for odd-width lines, by setting the lineCap style to square, so that the outer border of the stroke around the endpoint will be automatically extended to cover the whole pixel exactly).
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，在我们的垂直线示例中，Y位置仍然引用了整数网格线位置-如果没有，则在端点处我们会看到像素覆盖了一半（但还要注意，此行为取决于当前的 lineCap 样式）的默认值是 butt ；通过将 lineCap 样式设置为 square ，您可能想通过半像素坐标为奇数宽度的线计算一致的笔触，以便围绕端点的笔触的外边界将自动扩展为覆盖整个像素）。

trans-unit.source: Note: By default, getCurrentPosition() tries to answer as fast as possible with a low accuracy result. It is useful if you need a quick answer regardless of the accuracy. Devices with a GPS, for example, can take a minute or more to get a GPS fix, so less accurate data (IP location or wifi) may be returned to getCurrentPosition().
trans-unit.target: 注意：默认情况下， getCurrentPosition() 尝试以较低的准确性结果尽可能快地回答。如果您需要快速解答而不考虑准确性，这将很有用。例如，具有GPS的设备可能需要一分钟或更长时间才能获得GPS定位，因此精度较低的数据（IP位置或wifi）可能会返回给 getCurrentPosition() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: CORS support for Canvas 2D drawImage is implemented in Gecko 9.0. This means that using a cross-domain image with CORS approval does no longer taint the 2D canvas, so the 2D canvas remains usable as the source of a WebGL texture.

trans-unit.source: Note: In a real-world scenario in which the two peers aren't running in the same context, the process is a bit more involved; each side provides, one at a time, a suggested way to connect (for example, UDP, UDP with a relay, TCP, etc.) by calling RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate(), and they go back and forth until agreement is reached. But here, we just accept the first offer on each side, since there's no actual networking involved.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在现实世界中，两个对等方不在同一个上下文中运行，该过程要复杂得多。双方通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 一次提供一种建议的连接方式（例如UDP，带中继的UDP，TCP等），它们来回移动直到达成协议。但是在这里，我们只接受双方的第一个提议，因为没有实际的网络联系。

trans-unit.source: Note: It may be helpful to keep in mind that you receive the track event when a new inbound track has been added to your connection, and you call addTrack() to add a track to the far end of the connection, thereby triggering a track event on the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请记住，将新的入站轨道添加到连接中并接收到 track 事件，并调用 addTrack() 将轨道添加到连接的远端，从而触发 track 可能会有所帮助。远程对等体上发生事件。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's important to keep in mind that the icecandidate event is not sent when ICE candidates arrive from the other end of the call. Instead, they're sent by your own end of the call so that you can take on the job of transmitting the data over whatever channel you choose. This can be confusing when you're new to WebRTC.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请务必记住，当ICE候选人从通话的另一端到达时， icecandidate 事件不会发送。相反，它们是在您自己的通话结束时发送的，这样您就可以通过选择的任何通道来传输数据。当您不熟悉WebRTC时，这可能会造成混淆。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's important to note that if you're using this to log the timing for network traffic, the timer will report the total time for the transaction, while the time listed in the network panel is just the amount of time required for the header. If you have response body logging enabled, the time listed for the response header and body combined should match what you see in the console output.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请务必注意，如果您使用它来记录网络流量的计时，计时器将报告交易的总时间，而“网络”面板中列出的时间只是标题所需的时间。如果启用了响应正文日志记录，则响应头和正文组合的列出时间应与您在控制台输出中看到的时间匹配。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's important to note that in many cases, both pointer and mouse events get sent (in order to let non-pointer-specific code still interact with the user). If you use pointer events, you should call event.preventDefault() to keep the mouse event from being sent as well.
trans-unit.target: 注意：需要注意的是，在许多情况下，指针和鼠标事件都会被发送（以使非指针特定的代码仍与用户交互）。如果使用指针事件，则应调用 event.preventDefault() ,以防止鼠标事件也被发送。

trans-unit.source: Note: It's possible to build this polyfill putting two types of data as argument for send(): an ArrayBuffer (ui8Data.buffer – the commented code) or an ArrayBufferView (ui8Data, which is a typed array of 8-bit unsigned integers – uncommented code). However, on Google Chrome, when you try to send an ArrayBuffer, the following warning message will appear: ArrayBuffer is deprecated in XMLHttpRequest.send(). Use ArrayBufferView instead. Another possible approach to send binary data is the StringViewNon native typed arrays superclass in conjunction with the send() method.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以构建此polyfill，将两种类型的数据作为 send() 的参数： ArrayBuffer （ ui8Data.buffer –注释的代码）或 ArrayBufferView （ ui8Data ，它是8位无符号整数的类型化数组–未注释码）。但是，在Google Chrome上，当您尝试发送 ArrayBuffer 时，将出现以下警告消息： ArrayBuffer is deprecated in XMLHttpRequest.send(). trans-unit.source: Note: It's possible to set several locks at the same time. So, if the lock is set for only one orientation, the screen orientation will never change until the screen orientation is unlocked. Otherwise, the screen orientation will change from an orientation to another as long as the orientations are amongst the orientations the device has been locked to.
trans-unit.target: 注意：可以同时设置多个锁。因此，如果仅将锁定设置为一个方向，则在解锁屏幕方向之前，屏幕方向永远不会改变。否则，屏幕方向将从一个方向更改为另一个方向，只要这些方向处于设备已锁定到的方向之中即可。

trans-unit.source: Note: Keep in mind that this is part of the signaling process, the transport layer for which is an implementation detail that's entirely up to you. In this case, a WebSocket connection is used to send a JSON message with a type field with the value "video-offer" to the other peer. The contents of the object being passed to the sendToServer() function, along with everything else in the promise fulfillment handler, depend entirely on your design.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请记住，这是信令过程的一部分，传输层的实现细节完全由您决定。在这种情况下，将使用WebSocket连接将 type 值为“ video-offer” 的JSON消息发送给另一个对等方。传递给 sendToServer() 函数的对象的内容，以及承诺实现处理程序中的所有其他内容，完全取决于您的设计。

In the case of UI events, this is important for security reasons, as it prevents scripts from simulating user actions that interact with the browser itself.

trans-unit.source: Note: Sites which automatically play audio (or videos with an audio track) can be an unpleasant experience for users, so it should be avoided when possible. However, this can be useful when creating media elements whose source will be set at a later time, under user control.

trans-unit.source: Note: Starting in Gecko 9.0, progress events can now be relied upon to come in for every chunk of data received, including the last chunk in cases in which the last packet is received and the connection closed before the progress event is fired. trans-unit.source: Note: The important thing to note is this: the only thing your code is responsible for during ICE negotiation is accepting outgoing candidates from the ICE layer and sending them across the signaling connection to the other peer when your onicecandidate handler is executed, and receiving ICE candidate messages from the signaling server (when the "new-ice-candidate" message is received) and delivering them to your ICE layer by calling RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate(). That's it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：需要注意的重要一点是：在ICE协商期间，您的代码唯一负责的是从ICE层接受传出的候选者，并在执行 onicecandidate 处理程序时通过信令连接将其发送到另一个对等方，并接收ICE来自信令服务器 "new-ice-candidate" 消息（收到“ new-ice-candidate”消息时），并通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.addIceCandidate() 将它们传递到ICE层。而已。

trans-unit.source: Note: The reason for this flipping of the z axis is that the clip space coordinate system is a left-handed coordinate system (z-axis points into the screen), while the convention in mathematics, physics and 3D modeling, as well as for the view/eye coordinate system in OpenGL, is to use a right-handed coordinate system (z-axis points out of the screen towards the viewer) . More on that in the relevant Wikipedia articles: Cartesian coordinate system, Right-hand rule.
trans-unit.target: 注意： z轴发生这种翻转的原因是，剪辑空间坐标系是左手坐标系（z轴指向屏幕），而数学，物理学和3D建模以及在OpenGL中，视图/眼睛坐标系将使用右手坐标系（z轴指向屏幕，朝向观察者）。有关Wikipedia文章的更多信息：笛卡尔坐标系，右手法则。

trans-unit.source: Note: This interface is called HTMLCollection for historical reasons (before the modern DOM, collections implementing this interface could only have HTML elements as their items).
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于历史原因，此接口称为 HTMLCollection （在现代DOM之前，实现此接口的集合只能将HTML元素作为其项）。

trans-unit.source: Note: This interface is obsolete per the latest specification. Use the new DOM4 DOMError interface instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：根据最新规范，此接口已过时。请改用新的DOM4 DOMError 接口。

trans-unit.source: Note: This interface was called RTCRTPStreamStats until a specification update in the spring of 2017. Check the Browser compatibility table to know if and when the name change was implemented in specific browsers.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在2017年春季规范更新之前，该接口一直称为 RTCRTPStreamStats 。检查浏览器兼容性表以了解是否以及何时在特定浏览器中实现了名称更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: This interface was introduced in SVG 2 and replaces the SVGLocatable and SVGTransformable interfaces from SVG 1.1.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此接口是SVG 2中引入的，它替代了SVG 1.1中的 SVGLocatable 和 SVGTransformable 接口。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is currently only proposed, is not expected to become standard, and is only implemented by recent builds of Internet Explorer.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该方法目前仅被提议，不会成为标准方法，仅由Internet Explorer的最新版本实现。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is implemented as Document.querySelector(), DocumentFragment.querySelector() and Element.querySelector().
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法实现为 Document.querySelector() ， DocumentFragment.querySelector() 和 Element.querySelector() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is implemented as Element.querySelectorAll(), Document.querySelectorAll(), and DocumentFragment.querySelectorAll()
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法实现为 Element.querySelectorAll() ， Document.querySelectorAll() 和 DocumentFragment.querySelectorAll()

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is implemented based on the ParentNode mixin's querySelectorAll() method.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法是基于 ParentNode mixin的 querySelectorAll() 方法实现的。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is not available from service workers, due to issues with the Blob interface's life cycle and the potential for leaks.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 Blob 接口的生命周期和潜在的泄漏问题，服务工作者无法使用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method is obsolete. You should use the element.getBoundingClientRect() method instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法已过时。您应该改用 element.getBoundingClientRect() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method must be called while responding to a user interaction or a device orientation change; otherwise it will fail.
trans-unit.target: 注意：必须在响应用户交互或设备方向更改时调用此方法。否则会失败。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method only works for installed Web apps or for Web pages in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法仅适用于已安装的Web应用程序或全屏模式的 Web页面。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method produces the same result for: a) a record that doesn't exist in the database and b) a record that has an undefined value. To tell these situations apart, call the openCursor() method with the same key. That method provides a cursor if the record exists, and no cursor if it does not.
trans-unit.target: 注意：对于以下情况，此方法产生相同的结果：a）数据库中不存在的记录，以及b）具有未定义值的记录。为了区分这些情况，请使用相同的键调用 openCursor() 方法。如果记录存在，该方法将提供一个游标，否则将不提供任何游标。

trans-unit.source: Note: This method was originally part of the SVGPathElement interface. SVG 2 introduced the SVGGeometryElement interface and moved the property to it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此方法最初是 SVGPathElement 接口的一部分。SVG 2引入了 SVGGeometryElement 接口，并将属性移至该接口。

trans-unit.source: Note: This never affects same-site requests.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这永远不会影响相同站点的请求。

trans-unit.source: Note: This page needs heavy rewriting for structural integrity and content completeness. Lots of info here is good but the organization is a mess since this is sort of a dumping ground right now.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了结构上的完整性和内容的完整性，此页面需要大量重写。这里的很多信息都很好，但是组织混乱，因为现在这是一个垃圾场。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property can be fragile, in that there may be situations in which the returned Event is not the expected value. In addition, Window.event is not accurate for events dispatched within shadow trees.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性可能是脆弱的，因为在某些情况下，返回的 Event 不是预期值。此外， Window.event 对于在阴影树内调度的事件而言并不准确。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property only works if the event system supports it for the particular event.
trans-unit.target: 注意：仅当事件系统支持特定事件时，此属性才起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property was originally part of the SVGPathElement interface. SVG 2 introduced the SVGGeometryElement interface and moved the property to it.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性最初是 SVGPathElement 接口的一部分。SVG 2引入了 SVGGeometryElement 接口，并将属性移至该接口。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property will round the value to an integer. If you need a fractional value, use element.getBoundingClientRect().
trans-unit.target: 注意：此属性会将值四舍五入为整数。如果需要分数，请使用 element.getBoundingClientRect() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This property's value is determined once the local peer has called RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription(); the provided description is used by the ICE agent to determine whether or not the remote peer supports trickled ICE candidates.
trans-unit.target: 注意：一旦本地对等方调用 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() ，就确定此属性的值。ICE代理使用提供的描述来确定远程对等是否支持点滴的ICE候选对象。

trans-unit.source: Note: This solution is very expensive for the interpreter. Use it only when it is really necessary.
trans-unit.target: 注意：该解决方案对于口译员来说非常昂贵。仅在确实必要时使用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: This takes advantage of the fact that the HTMLVideoElement interface looks like an HTMLImageElement to any API that accepts an HTMLImageElement as a parameter, with the video's current frame presented as the image's contents.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这利用了以下事实：对于任何接受 HTMLImageElement 作为参数的API， HTMLVideoElement 接口看起来都像 HTMLImageElement ，并且视频的当前帧作为图像的内容呈现。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value doesn't change when document.enableStyleSheetsForSet() is called.
trans-unit.target: 注意：调用 document.enableStyleSheetsForSet() 时，此值不会更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is not the same as the value of MediaStramTrack.id.
trans-unit.target: 注意：这个值是不一样的价值 MediaStramTrack.id 。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is only available for video media.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值仅适用于视频媒体。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is only available on the receiver, and only for video media.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值仅在接收器上可用，并且仅对于视频媒体可用。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is only available on the receiver.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值仅在接收器上可用。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value is sent by the sender to the receiver and is only present for video media.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值由发送方发送到接收方，仅在视频媒体中存在。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value moved into the RTCPeerConnectionState enum in the May 13, 2016 draft of the specification, as it reflects the state of the RTCPeerConnection, not the signaling connection. You now detect a closed connection by checking for connectionState to be "closed" instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值已移入规范的2016年5月13日草案的 RTCPeerConnectionState 枚举中，因为它反映了 RTCPeerConnection 的状态，而不是信令连接。现在，您可以通过检查 connectionState 被 "closed" 来检测关闭的连接。

trans-unit.source: Note: This value moved into the RTCPeerConnectionState enum in the May 13, 2016 draft of the specification, as it reflects the state of the RTCPeerConnection, not the signaling connection. You now detect a closed connection by checking for connectionState to be "closed" instead.
trans-unit.target: 注意：此值已移入规范的2016年5月13日草案的 RTCPeerConnectionState 枚举中，因为它反映了 RTCPeerConnection 的状态，而不是信令连接。现在，您可以通过检查 connectionState 被 "closed" 来检测关闭的连接。

trans-unit.source: Note: Though the AudioParam returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管返回的 AudioParam 是只读的，但它表示的值不是。

trans-unit.source: Note: To both create and render a rectangle in one step, use the fillRect() or strokeRect() methods.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要在一个步骤中创建和渲染矩形，请使用 fillRect() 或 strokeRect() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: To combat unwanted pop-ups, some browsers don't display prompts created in beforeunload event handlers unless the page has been interacted with; some don't display them at all. For a list of specific browsers, see the Browser compatibility section.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为了避免不必要的弹出窗口，除非页面已与之交互，否则某些浏览器不会显示在 beforeunload 事件处理程序中创建的提示。有些根本不显示它们。有关特定浏览器的列表，请参阅“ 浏览器兼容性”部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: To create a new sub-path, i.e., one matching the current canvas state, you can use CanvasRenderingContext2D.moveTo().
trans-unit.target: 注意：要创建一个新的子路径，即与当前画布状态匹配的子路径，可以使用 CanvasRenderingContext2D.moveTo() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: To learn more about the arc() function, see the Arcs section below.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要了解有关 arc() 函数的更多信息，请参见下面的“ 弧”部分。

trans-unit.source: Note: To return to using solid lines, set the line dash list to an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 注意：要返回使用实线，请将破折号列表设置为空数组。

trans-unit.source: Note: Until the Indexed Database API specification is finalized, this attribute should be accessed as moz_indexedDBSync.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在完成Indexed Database API规范之前，应以 moz_indexedDBSync 的形式访问此属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: Use the fullscreenElement property on the Document or ShadowRoot instead; if it's not null, then it's an Element currently being displayed in full-screen mode.
trans-unit.target: 注意：改用 Document 或 ShadowRoot 上的 fullscreenElement 属性；如果它不为 null ，则它是当前以全屏模式显示的 Element 。

trans-unit.source: Note: Want to draw a circle? The arc() method is the best way. Simply specify a start angle of 0 radians (0°) and an end angle of 2π radians (360°).
trans-unit.target: 注意：要画一个圆吗？该 arc() 方法是最好的方法。只需指定0弧度（0 °）的起始角度和2π弧度（360 °）的终止角度即可。

trans-unit.source: Note: We could restrict the set of permitted media inputs to a specific device or set of devices by calling navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() to get a list of devices, filtering the resulting list based on our desired criteria, then using the selected devices' deviceId values in the deviceId field of the the mediaConstraints object passed into getUserMedia(). In practice, this is rarely if ever necessary, since most of that work is done for you by getUserMedia().
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们可以通过调用 navigator.mediaDevices.enumerateDevices() 来获取设备列表，根据所需的条件过滤结果列表，然后使用选定的设备，将允许的媒体输入集限制为特定设备或设备集“ deviceId 中的值 deviceId 的所述的场 mediaConstraints 对象传递到 getUserMedia() 。实际上，这几乎是不需要的，因为大多数工作都是由 getUserMedia() 为您完成的。

trans-unit.source: Note: Web Storage is not the same as mozStorage (Mozilla's XPCOM interfaces to SQLite) or the Session store API (an XPCOM storage utility for use by extensions).
trans-unit.target: 注意： Web存储与mozStorage（Mozilla的XPCOM与SQLite的接口）或会话存储API（供扩展使用的XPCOM存储实用程序）不同。

trans-unit.source: Note: Web sites may only register content handlers for themselves. For security reasons, it's not possible for an extension or web site to register content handlers targeting other sites.
trans-unit.target: 注意：网站只能为自己注册内容处理程序。出于安全原因，扩展程序或网站无法注册针对其他网站的内容处​​理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: WebKit returns the time string in UTC; Gecko and Internet Explorer return a time in the local timezone.
trans-unit.target: 注意： WebKit以UTC返回时间字符串。Gecko和Internet Explorer返回本地时区的时间。

trans-unit.source: Note: WebRTC actually uses SRTP (Secure Real-time Transport Protocol) to ensure that the exchanged data is secure and authenticated as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 注意： WebRTC实际上使用SRTP（安全实时传输协议）来确保交换的数据是安全的，并在适当时进行了身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Note: When
trans-unit.target: 注意：何时

trans-unit.source: Note: When implementing a mute/unmute feature, you should use the enabled property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：实施静音/取消静音功能时，应使用 enabled 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: When inserted using the document.write() method, <script> elements execute (typically synchronously), but when inserted using innerHTML or outerHTML, they do not execute at all.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 document.write() 方法插入时， <script> 元素会执行（通常是同步执行），但是使用 innerHTML 或 outerHTML 插入时，它们根本不会执行。

trans-unit.source: Note: When the current path is empty, such as immediately after calling beginPath(), or on a newly created canvas, the first path construction command is always treated as a moveTo(), regardless of what it actually is. For that reason, you will almost always want to specifically set your starting position after resetting a path.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当当前路径为空时，例如在调用 beginPath() 之后立即在新创建的画布上，或者在新创建的画布上，则无论实际是什么，第一个路径构造命令始终被视为 moveTo() 。因此，您几乎总是希望在重置路径后专门设置起始位置。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using WebGL2, this method is available as gl.drawArraysInstanced() by default.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 WebGL2 时，默认情况下此方法可作为 gl.drawArraysInstanced() 使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using WebGL2, this method is available as gl.drawBuffers() by default and the constants are named gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT1 etc. without the "WEBGL" suffix.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 WebGL2 时，此方法默认情况下可作为 gl.drawBuffers() 使用，并且常量名为 gl.COLOR_ATTACHMENT1 等，不带“ WEBGL”后缀。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using WebGL2, this method is available as gl.drawElementsInstanced() by default.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 WebGL2 时，默认情况下此方法可作为 gl.drawElementsInstanced() 使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using WebGL2, this method is available as gl.vertexAttribDivisor() by default.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 WebGL2 时，默认情况下此方法可作为 gl.vertexAttribDivisor() 使用。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using WebGL 1, the ANGLE_instanced_arrays extension can provide this method, too.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用WebGL 1时， ANGLE_instanced_arrays 扩展也可以提供此方法。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using the click event to trigger an action, also consider adding this same action to the keydown event, to allow the use of that same action by people who don't use a mouse or a touch screen.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 click 事件触发动作时，还应考虑将相同动作添加到 keydown 事件中，以允许不使用鼠标或触摸屏的人使用相同动作。

trans-unit.source: Note: When you call fill(), any open shapes are closed automatically, so you don't have to call closePath(). This is not the case when you call stroke().
trans-unit.target: 注意：调用 fill() 时，所有打开的形状都会自动关闭，因此您不必调用 closePath() 。这是不是的情况下，当你调用 stroke() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: When you set the strokeStyle and/or fillStyle property, the new value becomes the default for all shapes being drawn from then on. For every shape you want in a different color, you will need to reassign the fillStyle or strokeStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：设置 strokeStyle 和/或 fillStyle 属性时，新值将成为从此以后绘制的所有形状的默认值。对于您想要使用不同颜色的每个形状，您将需要重新分配 fillStyle 或 strokeStyle 属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: While onblur and onfocus will tell you if the user switches windows, it doesn't necessarily mean it's hidden. Pages only become hidden when the user switches tabs or minimizes the browser window containing the tab.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管 onblur 和 onfocus 会告诉您用户是否切换窗口，但这并不一定意味着它是隐藏的。仅当用户切换标签或最小化包含标签的浏览器窗口时，页面才会隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Note: While returnValue has been adopted into the DOM standard, it is present primarily to support existing code. You should use preventDefault() and defaultPrevented instead of this historical property.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然 returnValue 已被DOM标准采用，但它主要用于支持现有代码。您应该使用 preventDefault() 和 defaultPrevented 而不是此历史属性。

trans-unit.source: Note: While a WebSocket connection is functionally somewhat similar to standard Unix-style sockets, they are not related.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然WebSocket连接在功能上与标准Unix风格的套接字有些相似，但它们并不相关。

trans-unit.source: Note: Whitespace forms part of a Text node, meaning indentation and newlines form separate Text between the Element nodes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：空格是 Text 节点的一部分，这意味着缩进和换行符在 Element 节点之间形成了单独的 Text 。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also add a handler for the addtrack event using addEventListener().
trans-unit.target: 注意：您还可以使用 addEventListener() 为 addtrack 事件添加处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also add a handler for the change event using addEventListener().
trans-unit.target: 注意：您还可以使用 addEventListener() 添加 change 事件的处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can also add a handler for the removetrack event using addEventListener().
trans-unit.target: 注意：您还可以使用 addEventListener() 为 removetrack 事件添加处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can implement standard "mute" functionality by setting enabled to false, and unmute the media by setting it back to true again.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以通过将 enabled 设置为 false 来实现标准的“静音”功能，并通过将其再次设置为 true 来取消静音。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can implement standard "mute" functionality by setting enabled to false. The muted property refers to a condition in which there's no media because of a technical issue.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以通过将 enabled 设置为 false 来实现标准的“静音”功能。在 muted 性能是指有技术问题，因此没有媒体的条件。

trans-unit.source: Note: You can use watchPosition() without an initial getCurrentPosition() call.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您可以在没有初始 getCurrentPosition() 调用的情况下使用 watchPosition() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: You may not use a timeout for synchronous requests with an owning window.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不能对拥有窗口的同步请求使用超时。

trans-unit.source: Note: You need to add the event listeners before calling open() on the request. Otherwise the progress events will not fire.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您需要在请求上调用 open() 之前添加事件侦听器。否则， progress 事件将不会触发。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should always use STUN/TURN servers which you own, or which you have specific authorization to use. This example is using a known public STUN server but abusing these is bad form.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您应始终使用自己拥有的STUN / TURN服务器，或具有特定使用权限的服务器。本示例使用的是已知的公共STUN服务器，但滥用它们是错误的形式。

trans-unit.source: Note: You should use this instead of the non-standard, deprecated getPreventDefault() method (see bug 691151).
trans-unit.target: 注意：您应该使用此方法，而不要使用不 getPreventDefault() 使用的非标准getPreventDefault（）方法（请参见bug 691151）。

trans-unit.source: Note: You shouldn't use this legacy property. Instead, use RTCRtpTransceiver to control whether or not to accept incoming audio.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不应使用此旧版属性。而是使用 RTCRtpTransceiver 来控制是否接受传入的音频。

trans-unit.source: Note: You shouldn't use this legacy property. Instead, use RTCRtpTransceiver to control whether or not to accept incoming video.
trans-unit.target: 注意：您不应使用此旧版属性。而是使用 RTCRtpTransceiver 来控制是否接受传入的视频。

trans-unit.source: Note: Your callback routine must itself call requestAnimationFrame() if you want to animate another frame at the next repaint.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果要在下一次重绘时为另一个帧设置动画，则回调例程必须自己调用 requestAnimationFrame() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: at the top of the fetch() block we log the response ok value to the console.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在 fetch() 块的顶部，我们将响应 ok 值记录到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Note: if you have content blocking features enabled in your browser, the example may not work inline below. In that case, you can view the example on its own page.
trans-unit.target: 注意：如果您在浏览器中启用了内容阻止功能，则以下示例可能无法内联工作。在这种情况下，您可以在示例页面上查看示例。

trans-unit.source: Note: it is not good practice to embed a script inside HTML. We do it here to keep the example concise.
trans-unit.target: 注意：将脚本嵌入HTML并不是一个好习惯。我们这样做是为了保持示例简洁。

trans-unit.source: Note: though the AudioParam returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
trans-unit.target: 注意：尽管返回的 AudioParam 是只读的，但它表示的值不是。

trans-unit.source: Note: using EventSourceis not supported by all browsers. Please check out the Browser compatibility section.
trans-unit.target: 注意：并非所有浏览器都支持使用EventSource。请查看“ 浏览器兼容性”部分。

trans-unit.source: Note:Regular HTTP status codes can only be used before the handshake. After the handshake succeeds, you have to use a different set of codes (defined in section 7.4 of the spec).
trans-unit.target: 注意：常规的HTTP状态代码只能在握手之前使用。握手成功后，您必须使用一组不同的代码（在规范的7.4节中定义）。

trans-unit.source: Note:XMLHttpRequest can parse XML and HTML directly from a URL-addressable resource, returning a Document in its response property.
trans-unit.target: 注意： XMLHttpRequest 可以直接从URL可寻址资源解析XML和HTML，并在其 response 属性中返回 Document 。

trans-unit.source: Note:KeyboardEvent events just indicate what interaction the user had with a key on the keyboard at a low level, providing no contextual meaning to that interaction. When you need to handle text input, use the input event instead. Keyboard events may not be fired if the user is using an alternate means of entering text, such as a handwriting system on a tablet or graphics tablet.
trans-unit.target: 注意： KeyboardEvent 事件仅指示用户与键盘上的某个键的交互程度较低，没有提供该交互的上下文含义。当您需要处理文本输入时，请改用 input 事件。如果用户使用其他输入文本的方式（例如，数位板或图形输入板上的手写系统），则可能不会触发键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: Note:RTCPeerConnection and RTCSessionDescription are currently prefixed in many browsers. It's strongly recommended you use a shim library such as the excellent and broadly supported Adapter.js, in order to ensure the broadest possible compatibility of your site or Web app. It's worth noting that Adapter.js goes beyond prefix handling, implementing shims to bridge compatibility gaps between browsers' implementations of WebRTC.
trans-unit.target: 注意： RTCPeerConnection 和 RTCSessionDescription 当前在许多浏览器中都有前缀。强烈建议您使用填充程序库，例如功能强大且受广泛支持的Adapter.js，以确保您的网站或Web应用程序具有尽可能广泛的兼容性。值得注意的是，Adapter.js超出了前缀处理的范围，实现了填充以弥合浏览器的WebRTC实现之间的兼容性差距。

trans-unit.source: Note:XMLHttpRequest can now interpret HTML for you using the responseXML property. Read the article about HTML in XMLHttpRequest to learn how to do this.

trans-unit.source: Note: Cache.add/Cache.addAll do not cache responses with Response.status values that are not in the 200 range, whereas Cache.put lets you store any request/response pair. As a result, Cache.add/Cache.addAll can't be used to store opaque responses, whereas Cache.put can.
trans-unit.target: 注意： Cache.add / Cache.addAll 不会缓存 Response.status 值不在200范围内的响应，而 Cache.put 允许您存储任何请求/响应对。结果， Cache.add / Cache.addAll 不能用于存储不透明的响应，而 Cache.put 可以。

trans-unit.source: Note: CacheStorage.match() is a convenience method. trans-unit.target: 注意： CacheStorage.match() 是一种便捷方法。等效的功能相匹配的高速缓存条目可以通过打开你的缓存实现 CacheStorage.open() ，返回它包含的条目 CacheStorage.keys() ，并匹配你想要的与 CacheStorage.match() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: createBuffer() used to be able to take compressed data and give back decoded samples, but this ability was removed from the spec, because all the decoding was done on the main thread, therefore createBuffer() was blocking other code execution. The asynchronous method decodeAudioData() does the same thing — takes compressed audio, say, an MP3 file, and directly gives you back an AudioBuffer that you can then set to play via in an AudioBufferSourceNode. For simple uses like playing an MP3, decodeAudioData() is what you should be using.
trans-unit.target: 注意： createBuffer() 曾经能够获取压缩数据并返回解码后的样本，但是此功能已从规范中删除，因为所有解码均在主线程上完成，因此 createBuffer() 阻止了其他代码的执行。异步方法 decodeAudioData() 做同样的事情- 提取压缩的音频（例如MP3文件），并直接向您返回一个 AudioBuffer ，然后可以将其设置为在 AudioBufferSourceNode 中播放。对于诸如播放MP3之类的简单用途，应使用 decodeAudioData() 。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of Firefox 40, IndexedDB transactions have relaxed durability guarantees to increase performance (see bug 1112702.) Previously in a readwrite transaction IDBTransaction.oncomplete was fired only when all data was guaranteed to have been flushed to disk. In Firefox 40+ the complete event is fired after the OS has been told to write the data but potentially before that data has actually been flushed to disk. The complete event may thus be delivered quicker than before, however, there exists a small chance that the entire transaction will be lost if the OS crashes or there is a loss of system power before the data is flushed to disk. Since such catastrophic events are rare most consumers should not need to concern themselves further. If you must ensure durability for some reason (e.g. you're storing critical data that cannot be recomputed later) you can force a transaction to flush to disk before delivering the complete event by creating a transaction using the experimental (non-standard) readwriteflush mode (see IDBDatabase.transaction.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Firefox 40开始，IndexedDB事务具有宽松的持久性保证，以提高性能（请参阅bug1112702。）以前，在 readwrite 事务中，仅当确保将所有数据都刷新到磁盘时才触发 IDBTransaction.oncomplete 。在Firefox 40+中，会在操作系统被告知写入数据后但可能实际上未将数据刷新到磁盘之前触发 complete 事件。该 complete 因此，事件传递的速度可能比以前更快，但是，如果OS崩溃或在将数据刷新到磁盘之前失去系统电源，则很有可能丢失整个事务。由于这种灾难性事件很少发生，因此大多数消费者不需要进一步担心自己。如果由于某种原因必须确保持久性（例如，您存储的关键数据以后无法重新计算），则可以通过使用实验性（非标准） readwriteflush 模式创建事务来强制事务在交付 complete 事件之前刷新到磁盘。（请参阅 IDBDatabase.transaction 。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of Firefox 44, the permissions for Notifications and Push have been merged. If permission is granted for notifications, push will also be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从Firefox 44开始，通知和推送的权限已合并。如果授予通知权限，则还将启用推送。

trans-unit.source: Note: As of Gecko 44, the allowed quota of push messages per application is not incremented when a new notification fires, when another is still visible, for a period of three seconds. trans-unit.source: Note: Be aware that the clipping region is only constructed from shapes added to the path. It doesn't work with shape primitives drawn directly to the canvas, such as fillRect(). Instead, you'd have to use rect() to add a rectangular shape to the path before calling clip().
trans-unit.target: 注意：请注意，裁剪区域仅由添加到路径的形状构成。它不适用于直接绘制到画布上的形状图元，例如 fillRect() 。相反，在调用 clip() 之前，必须使用 rect() 向路径添加矩形。

trans-unit.source: Note: Because oninstall/onactivate could take a while to complete, the service worker spec provides a waitUntil method, once this is called oninstall or onactivate, it passes a promise. Functional events are not dispatched to the service worker until the promise is successfully resolved.
trans-unit.target: 注意：由于 oninstall / onactivate 可能要花一些时间才能完成，因此服务工作者规范提供了一个 waitUntil 方法，一旦将其称为 oninstall 或 onactivate ，它将通过一个promise。在成功解决承诺之前，不会将功能事件分派给服务工作者。

trans-unit.source: Note: Do not use this method for comparing arbitrary JavaScript values, because many JavaScript values are either not valid IndexedDB keys (booleans and objects, for example) or are treated as equivalent IndexedDB keys (for example, since IndexedDB ignores arrays with non-numeric properties and treats them as empty arrays, so any non-numeric arrays are treated as equivalent). This throws an exception if either of the values is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: 注意：请勿使用此方法比较任意JavaScript值，因为许多JavaScript值不是有效的IndexedDB键（例如，布尔值和对象），或者被视为等效的IndexedDB键（例如，因为IndexedDB忽略具有非数字的数组）属性并将其视为空数组，因此所有非数字数组均视为等效）。如果两个值中的任何一个都不是有效的键，则将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Note: Everything you do in IndexedDB always happens in the context of a transaction, representing interactions with data in the database. All objects in IndexedDB — including object stores, indexes, and cursors — are tied to a particular transaction. Thus, you cannot execute commands, access data, or open anything outside of a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 注意：在IndexedDB中所做的一切始终在事务的上下文中发生，代表与数据库中数据的交互。IndexedDB中的所有对象（包括对象存储，索引和游标）都绑定到特定事务​​。因此，您无法执行命令，访问数据或打开事务外的任何内容。

trans-unit.source: Note: Firefox, Chrome and Opera used to have support for encoding types other than utf-8 (such as utf-16, iso-8859-2, koi8, cp1261, and gbk). As of Firefox 48 (bug 1257877), Chrome 54 (ticket) and Opera 41, no other encoding types are available other than utf-8, in order to match the spec. In all cases, passing in an encoding type to the constructor will be ignored and a utf-8 TextEncoder will be created (the TextDecoder still allows for other decoding types).
trans-unit.target: 注意：Firefox，Chrome和Opera曾经支持 utf-8 以外的其他编码类型（例如 utf-16 ， iso-8859-2 ， koi8 ， cp1261 和 gbk ）。自Firefox 48（错误1257877），Chrome 54（票证）和Opera 41起，为了符合规范，除 utf-8 之外没有其他可用的编码类型。在所有情况下，将忽略将编码类型传递给构造函数，并创建utf-8 TextEncoder（ TextDecoder 仍然允许其他解码类型）。

trans-unit.source: Note: In Firefox, if you wish to ensure durability for some reason (e.g. you're storing critical data that cannot be recomputed later) you can force a transaction to flush to disk before delivering the complete event by creating a transaction using the experimental (non-standard) readwriteflush mode (see IDBDatabase.transaction.) trans-unit.source: Note: Initial Cache implementations (in both Blink and Gecko) resolve Cache.add, Cache.addAll, and Cache.put promises when the response body is fully written to the disk. trans-unit.source: Note: Just calling history.pushState() or history.replaceState() won't trigger a popstate event. The popstate event is only triggered by doing a browser action such as a clicking on the back button (or calling history.back() in JavaScript). trans-unit.target: 注意：仅调用 history.pushState() 或 history.replaceState() 不会触发 popstate 事件。该 popstate 事件仅做一个浏览器行动，诸如后退按钮的点击（或调用触发 history.back() 在JavaScript）。并且仅当用户在同一文档的两个历史记录条目之间导航时才触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Note: One great thing about service workers is that if you use feature detection like we’ve shown above, browsers that don’t support service workers can just use your app online in the normal expected fashion. trans-unit.source: Note: Starting with version 1.4, Mozilla-based browsers have a window resizing grippy at the right end of the status bar, this ensures that users can resize the browser window even if the web author requested this secondary window to be non-resizable. In such case, the maximize/restore icon in the window's titlebar will be disabled and the window's borders won't allow resizing but the window will still be resizable via that grippy in the status bar.
trans-unit.target: 注意：从1.4版开始，基于Mozilla的浏览器在状态栏的右端具有窗口大小调整功能，即使网络作者要求该第二窗口不可调整大小，这也可以确保用户可以调整浏览器窗口的大小。在这种情况下，窗口标题栏中的最大化/还原图标将被禁用，并且窗口的边框将不允许调整大小，但是窗口仍将通过状态栏中的那个可调整大小进行调整。

trans-unit.target: 注意： Body 函数只能运行一次；后续调用将使用空字符串/ ArrayBuffers解析。

trans-unit.source: Note: The Web Audio API comes with two types of filter nodes: BiquadFilterNode and IIRFilterNode. For the most part a biquad filter will be good enough — it comes with different types such as lowpass, highpass, and bandpass. If you're looking to do something more bespoke, however, the IIR filter might be a good option — see Using IIR filters for more information.
trans-unit.target: 注意：Web Audio API附带两种类型的过滤器节点： BiquadFilterNode 和 IIRFilterNode 。在大多数情况下，双二阶滤波器就足够了-它带有低通，高通和带通等不同类型。但是，如果您想做更多定制的事情，IIR过滤器可能是一个不错的选择— 有关更多信息，请参见使用IIR过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Note: The entire bitmap is loaded regardless of what size is specified in the constructor. If any size is specified in the constructor it will be reflected through the properties HTMLImageElement.width and HTMLImageElement.height of the resulting instance. The intrinsic width and height of the image in CSS pixels is reflected through the properties HTMLImageElement.naturalWidth and HTMLImageElement.naturalHeight. If no size is specified in the constructor both pairs of these properties will have the same values.
trans-unit.target: 注意：无论在构造函数中指定了什么大小，都会加载整个位图。如果在构造函数中指定了任何大小，它将通过结果实例的属性 HTMLImageElement.width 和 HTMLImageElement.height 反映出来。 CSS像素中图像的固有宽度和高度通过属性 HTMLImageElement.naturalWidth 和 HTMLImageElement.naturalHeight 反映。如果在构造函数中未指定大小，则这两个属性对将具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The information below should be fairly accurate for most modern browsers, but browser specifics are called out where known. Opera and Chrome should behave the same in all cases. Opera Mini (still presto-based, server-side rendering) doesn't store any data on the client.
Note: The key matching algorithm depends on the VARY header in the value. So matching a new key requires looking at both key and value for entries in the Cache.
trans-unit.target: 注意：密钥匹配算法取决于值中的VARY标头。因此，匹配新密钥需要同时查看缓存中条目的密钥和值。

trans-unit.source: Note: The matching is done using depth-first pre-order traversal of the document's nodes starting with the first element in the document's markup and iterating through sequential nodes by order of the number of child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：匹配是使用文档节点的深度优先顺序遍历来完成的，该遍历从文档标记中的第一个元素开始，并按照子节点的数量顺序遍历顺序节点。

trans-unit.source: Note: The user can potentially see all the way around them, which is a brand new concept for apps and games. Try to give people a reason to look around and see what's behind them — make them reach out and find things that are not visible at the very beginning. Describe what's behind their backs.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用户可能会看到所有周围的东西，这是应用程序和游戏的全新概念。尝试让人们有理由环顾四周，看看背后有什么-让他们伸出手，发现一开始不可见的东西。描述他们背后的背后。

trans-unit.source: Note: The values of node objects (e.g. GainNode.gain) are not simple values; they are actually objects of type AudioParam — these called parameters. This is why we have to set GainNode.gain's value property, rather than just setting the value on gain directly. This enables them to be much more flexible, allowing for passing the parameter a specific set of values to change between over a set period of time, for example.
trans-unit.target: 注意：节点对象的值（例如 GainNode.gain ）不是简单的值；它们实际上是 AudioParam 类型的对象 -这些称为参数。这就是为什么我们必须设置 GainNode.gain 的 value 属性，而不是直接设置 gain 值的原因。这使它们具有更大的灵活性，例如，允许向参数传递一组特定的值，以便在设定的时间段之间进行更改。

trans-unit.source: Note: There are slight differences in the way the audio spatialization sounds across different browsers. The panner node does some very involved maths under the hood; there are a number of tests here so you can keep track of the status of the inner workings of this node across different platforms.
trans-unit.target: 注意：跨不同浏览器的音频空间化声音的发送方式略有不同。Panner节点在幕后进行一些非常复杂的数学运算。这里有很多测试，因此您可以跨不同平台跟踪此节点的内部工作状态。

trans-unit.source: Note: There is a polyfill implementation to support all the legacy encodings in GitHub.

trans-unit.source: Note: There is also a clone() method that creates a copy. Both methods of creating a copy will fail if the body of the original request or response has already been read, but reading the body of a cloned response or request will not cause it to be marked as read in the original.
trans-unit.target: 注意：还有一个 clone() 方法可创建副本。如果已经读取了原始请求或响应的正文，则创建副本的这两种方法都将失败，但是读取克隆的响应或请求的正文将不会导致将其标记为在原始中为已读。

trans-unit.source: Note: To be clear, the difference between Headers.set() and Headers.append() is that if the specified header does already exist and does accept multiple values, Headers.set() will overwrite the existing value with the new one, whereas Headers.append() will append the new value onto the end of the set of values. See their dedicated pages for example code.
trans-unit.target: 注意：显然， Headers.set() 和 Headers.append() 之间的区别在于，如果指定的标头已经存在并接受多个值，则 Headers.set() 将用新的值覆盖现有值，而 Headers.append() 会将新值追加到值集的末尾。有关示例代码，请参见其专用页面。

trans-unit.source: Note: User interaction propagates to the Promise returned by both of these methods, allowing the callers to take actions that require user interaction without requiring a second click from the user. For example, a caller could open a pop-up window from the resolved Promise without triggering Firefox’s pop-up blocker.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用户交互传播到这两种方法返回的Promise，使调用者可以执行需要用户交互的操作，而无需用户第二次单击。例如，调用者可以从已解决的Promise中打开一个弹出窗口，而无需触发Firefox的弹出窗口阻止程序。

trans-unit.source: Note: Users shouldn’t add their own directories or files under <profile>/storage. This will cause storage initialization to fail; for example, open() will fire an error event.
trans-unit.target: 注意：用户不应在 <profile>/storage 下添加自己的目录或文件。这将导致存储初始化失败；例如， open() 将触发错误事件。

trans-unit.source: Note: We also don't have to use the default wave types for either of these oscillators we're creating — we could use a wavetable and the periodic wave method as we did before. There is a multitude of possibilities with just a minimum of nodes.
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们也不必为正在创建的任何一个振荡器使用默认的波形类型，我们可以像以前一样使用波表和周期波方法。仅有最少的节点，有许多可能性。

trans-unit.source: Note: We can call stop() on an AudioBufferSourceNode, however, this will happen automatically when the sample has finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们可以在 AudioBufferSourceNode 上调用 stop() ，但是，在样本播放完毕后，这将自动发生。

trans-unit.source: Note: We need to take into account the new autoplay policy that modern browsers have, which calls for a user gesture before media can play (see Chrome's Autoplay Policy Changes, for example). This has been implemented because autoplaying media is really bad for many reasons — it is annoying and intrusive at the very least, and also causes accessibility problems. This is accounted for by our play/pause button.
trans-unit.target: 注意：我们需要考虑现代浏览器的新自动播放政策，该政策要求用户在媒体播放之前先进行手势操作（例如，请参阅Chrome的自动播放政策更改）。之所以能够实现此功能，是因为由于多种原因，自动播放媒体的确很糟糕-至少令人讨厌且具有侵入性，并且还会导致可访问性问题。这是通过我们的播放/暂停按钮解决的。

trans-unit.source: Note: We'll talk about the property BaseAudioContext.currentTime later, so don't worry if you're unsure of it for now. All you really need to know is that it returns the time we are at right now.
trans-unit.target: 注意：稍后我们将讨论属性 BaseAudioContext.currentTime ，所以如果您现在不确定，请不要担心。您真正需要知道的是，它返回了我们现在的时间。

trans-unit.source: Note: What happens in the case of zero or negative desired size hasn’t really been defined in the spec so far. Patience is a virtue.
trans-unit.target: 注意：到目前为止，规范尚未真正定义零或负期望大小时会发生什么。耐心是一种美德。

trans-unit.source: Note: When abort() is called, the fetch() promise rejects with an AbortError.
trans-unit.target: 注意：调用 abort() 时， fetch() 承诺会因 AbortError 拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Note: When Header values are iterated over, they are automatically sorted in lexicographical order, and values from duplicate header names are combined.
trans-unit.target: 注意：重复遍历标头值时，它们将按字典顺序自动排序，并且来自重复标头名称的值将合并在一起。

trans-unit.source: Note: When a message is passed between the main thread and worker, it is copied or "transferred" (moved), not shared. Read Transferring data to and from workers: further details for a much more thorough explanation.
trans-unit.target: 注意：当消息在主线程和工作线程之间传递时，将被复制或“转移”（移动），而不是共享。请阅读与工作人员之间的数据传输：更多详细信息，以获取更彻底的解释。

trans-unit.source: Note: When testing, setting a weird/tiny field of view can really mess up your view. It is a good idea to grab the current field of view first (using VREyeParameters.currentFieldOfView) before making any drastic changes, so you can reset it afterwards if needed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：进行测试时，设置怪异/微小的视野确实会弄乱您的视野。在进行任何重大更改之前，最好先获取当前视场（使用 VREyeParameters.currentFieldOfView ），因此可以在需要时进行重置。

trans-unit.source: Note: When using the start() method to open the port connection, it needs to be called from both the parent thread and the worker thread if two-way communication is needed.
trans-unit.target: 注意：使用 start() 方法打开端口连接时，如果需要双向通信，则需要从父线程和工作线程中调用它。

trans-unit.source: Note: When you receive a "close" event, there is no guarantee that it's the user who closed the notification. This is in line with the specification, which states: "When a notification is closed, either by the underlying notifications platform or by the user, the close steps for it must be run."
trans-unit.target: 注意：当您收到“关闭”事件时，不能保证关闭通知的是用户。这符合规范，该规范指出：“当通知被基础通知平台或用户关闭时，必须运行该通知的关闭步骤。”

trans-unit.source: Note: While the DTMF is not sent to the remote peer as audio, browsers may choose to play the corresponding tone to the local user as part of their user experience, since users are typically used to hearing their phone play the tones audibly.
trans-unit.target: 注意：虽然DTMF不会作为音频发送给远程对等方，但浏览器可能会选择将相应的音调播放给本地用户，作为他们的用户体验的一部分，因为用户通常习惯于听他们的电话以声音的方式播放音调。

trans-unit.source: Note: Why -1 to 1? When outputting sound to a file or speakers we need to have a number to represent 0db full scale — the numerical limit of the fixed point media or DAC. In floating point audio, 1 is a convenient number to map to "full scale" for mathematical operations on signals, so oscillators, noise generators and other sound sources typically output bipolar signals in the range -1 to 1. A browser will clamp values outside this range.
trans-unit.target: 注意：为什么-1比1？在将声音输出到文件或扬声器时，我们需要有一个数字来代表0db满刻度-定点媒体或DAC的数字限制。在浮点音频中，1是一个方便的数字，可以映射到“满刻度”以对信号进行数学运算，因此振荡器，噪声发生器和其他声源通常输出-1到1范围内的双极性信号。浏览器会将值限制在外部这个范围。

trans-unit.source: Note: audio resampling is very similar to image resizing. Say you've got a 16 x 16 image, but you want it to fill a 32x32 area. You resize (or resample) it. The result has less quality (it can be blurry or edgy, depending on the resizing algorithm), but it works, with the resized image taking up less space. Resampled audio is exactly the same: you save space, but in practice you will be unable to properly reproduce high frequency content, or treble sound.
trans-unit.target: 注意：音频重采样与图像大小调整非常相似。假设您有一个16 x 16的图像，但是您希望它填充32x32的区域。您调整大小（或重新采样）。结果的质量较低（取决于调整大小的算法，它可能是模糊的或前卫的），但是它可以工作，并且调整大小后的图像占用更少的空间。重新采样的音频完全相同：您可以节省空间，但实际上，您将无法正确再现高频内容或高音。

trans-unit.source: Note: audio resampling is very similar to image resizing: say you've got a 16 x 16 image, but you want it to fill a 32x32 area: you resize (resample) it. the result has less quality (it can be blurry or edgy, depending on the resizing algorithm), but it works, and the resized image takes up less space. Resampled audio is exactly the same — you save space, but in practice you will be unable to properly reproduce high frequency content (treble sound).
trans-unit.target: 注意：音频重采样与图像大小调整非常相似：假设您有一个16 x 16的图像，但是您希望它填充32x32的区域：调整大小（重新采样）。结果的质量较低（取决于调整大小的算法，它可能是模糊的或前卫的），但是它可以工作，并且调整大小后的图像占用的空间较小。重新采样的音频完全相同-您可以节省空间，但实际上，您将无法正确再现高频内容（高音）。

trans-unit.source: Secure context
trans-unit.target: 安全上下文

trans-unit.source: Server Sends Challenge, User Info, and Relying Party Info - The server sends a challenge, user information, and relying party information to the JavaScript program. The protocol for communicating with the server is not specified and is outside of the scope of WebAuthn. Typically, server communications would be REST over https (probably using XMLHttpRequest or Fetch), but they could also be SOAP, RFC 2549 or nearly any other protocol provided that the protocol is secure. The parameters received from the server will be passed to the create() call, typically with little or no modification and returns a Promise that will resolve to a PublicKeyCredential containing an AuthenticatorAttestationResponse. Note that it is absolutely critical that the challenge be a buffer of random information (at least 16 bytes) and it MUST be generated on the server in order to ensure the security of the registration process.
trans-unit.target: 服务器发送质询，用户信息和依赖方信息 -服务器将质询，用户信息和依赖方信息发送到JavaScript程序。未指定用于与服务器通信的协议，该协议不在WebAuthn的范围内。通常，服务器通信将是基于https的REST（可能使用XMLHttpRequest或Fetch），但是如果该协议是安全的，它们也可以是SOAP，RFC 2549或几乎任何其他协议。从服务器接收到的参数将传递给create（）调用，通常只需很少或不做任何修改，并返回一个Promise，它将解析为一个 PublicKeyCredential 包含 AuthenticatorAttestationResponse 的PublicKeyCredential。请注意，挑战必须是随机信息（至少16个字节）的缓冲区，并且必须在服务器上生成以确保注册过程的安全性，这一点绝对至关重要。

trans-unit.source: Server Sends Challenge - The server sends a challenge to the JavaScript program. The protocol for communicating with the server is not specified and is outside of the scope of WebAuthn. Typically, server communications would be REST over https (probably using XMLHttpRequest or Fetch), but they could also be SOAP, RFC 2549 or nearly any other protocol provided that the protocol is secure. The parameters received from the server will be passed to the get() call, typically with little or no modification. Note that it is absolutely critical that the challenge be a buffer of random information (at least 16 bytes) and it MUST be generated on the server in order to ensure the security of the authentication process.
trans-unit.target: 服务器发送质询 -服务器向JavaScript程序发送质询。未指定用于与服务器通信的协议，该协议不在WebAuthn的范围内。通常，服务器通信将是基于https的REST（可能使用XMLHttpRequest或Fetch），但是如果该协议是安全的，它们也可以是SOAP，RFC 2549或几乎任何其他协议。从服务器接收到的参数将传递给get（）调用，通常只需很少或不做任何修改。请注意，挑战必须是随机信息（至少16个字节）的缓冲区，并且必须在服务器上生成，以确保身份验证过程的安全性，这一点至关重要。

trans-unit.source: TextTrackCues represent a string of text that will be displayed for some duration of time on a TextTrack. This includes the start and end times that the cue will be displayed. A TextTrackCue cannot be used directly, instead one of the derived types (e.g. VTTCue) must be used.
trans-unit.target: TextTrackCue表示一串文本，这些文本将在 TextTrack 上显示一段时间。这包括提示的开始和结束时间。甲TextTrackCue不能直接使用的，派生类型，而不是一个（例如 VTTCue ）必须被使用。

trans-unit.source: The IndexedDB API is mostly asynchronous. The API doesn't give you data by returning values; instead, you have to pass a callback function. You don't "store" a value into the database, or "retrieve" a value out of the database through synchronous means. Instead, you "request" that a database operation happens. You get notified by a DOM event when the operation finishes, and the type of event you get lets you know if the operation succeeded or failed. This sounds a little complicated at first, but there are sanity measures baked in. It's not that different from the way that XMLHttpRequest works.
trans-unit.target: IndexedDB API主要是异步的。API不会通过返回值来为您提供数据；相反，您必须传递一个回调函数。您不会通过同步方式将值“存储”到数据库中，也不会“从数据库中检索”值。而是，您“请求”发生数据库操作。当操作完成时，您将通过DOM事件得到通知，事件的类型将使您知道操作是成功还是失败。乍一看，这听起来有些复杂，但是其中引入了一些理智的措施。它与XMLHttpRequest的工作方式没有什么不同。

trans-unit.source: Tip: All browsers will send an Origin header. You can use this header for security (checking for same origin, whitelisting/ blacklisting, etc.) and send a 403 Forbidden if you don't like what you see. However, be warned that non-browser agents can just send a faked Origin. Most applications will reject requests without this header.
trans-unit.target: 提示：所有浏览器都会发送一个 Origin 标头。您可以将此标头用于安全性（检查相同来源，列入白名单/列入黑名单等），如果您不喜欢看到的内容，则发送“ 403禁止访问”。但是，请注意，非浏览器代理只能发送伪造的 Origin 。没有此标头的大多数应用程序将拒绝请求。

trans-unit.source: Tip: The request-uri (/chat here) has no defined meaning in the spec. So many people cleverly use it to let one server handle multiple WebSocket applications. For example, example.com/chat could invoke a multiuser chat app, while /game on the same server might invoke a multiplayer game.
trans-unit.target: 提示： request-uri（ /chat ）在规范中没有定义的含义。如此多的人巧妙地使用它来让一台服务器处理多个WebSocket应用程序。例如， example.com/chat /game chat可以调用多用户聊天应用程序，而同一服务器上的/ game可以调用多人游戏。

trans-unit.source: Tip: To avoid name conflict, it's recommended to make your subprotocol name part of a domain string. If you are building a custom chat app that uses a proprietary format exclusive to Example Inc., then you might use this: Sec-WebSocket-Protocol: chat.example.com. Note that this isn't required, it's just an optional convention, and you can use any string you wish.
trans-unit.target: 提示：为避免名称冲突，建议使子协议名称成为域字符串的一部分。如果您要构建使用Example Inc.专有的专有格式的自定义聊天应用程序，则可以使用以下代码： Sec-WebSocket-Protocol: chat.example.com 。请注意，这不是必需的，它只是一个可选约定，您可以使用所需的任何字符串。

trans-unit.source: Tip: For accessibility reasons, it is strongly encouraged to set this feature always on.

trans-unit.source: URL — The new history entry's URL is given by this parameter. Note that the browser won't attempt to load this URL after a call to pushState(), but it might attempt to load the URL later, for instance after the user restarts the browser. The new URL does not need to be absolute; if it's relative, it's resolved relative to the current URL. The new URL must be of the same origin as the current URL; otherwise, pushState() will throw an exception. This parameter is optional; if it isn't specified, it's set to the document's current URL.
trans-unit.target: URL-新历史记录条目的URL由此参数给出。请注意，在调用 pushState() 之后，浏览器将不会尝试加载此URL ，但是它可能稍后会尝试加载URL，例如在用户重新启动浏览器之后。新的URL不必是绝对的。如果是相对的，则相对于当前URL进行解析。新网址必须与当前网址具有相同的来源；否则， pushState() 将引发异常。该参数是可选的。如果未指定，则将其设置为文档的当前URL。

trans-unit.source: Uniforms are set by the JavaScript code and are available to both the vertex and fragment shaders. They're used to provide values that will be the same for everything drawn in the frame, such as lighting positions and magnitudes, global transformation and perspective details, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: 制服由JavaScript代码设置，并且可用于顶点和片段着色器。它们用于为框架中绘制的所有内容提供相同的值，例如照明位置和大小，全局变换和透视图细节等。

trans-unit.source: Use idle callbacks for tasks which don't have high priority. Because you don't know how many callbacks have been established, and you don't know how busy the user's system is, you don't know how often your callback will be run (unless you specify a timeout. There's no guarantee that every pass through the event loop (or even every screen update cycle) will include any idle callbacks being executed; if the event loop uses all available time, you're out of luck (again, unless you've used a timeout).
trans-unit.target: 对没有高优先级的任务使用空闲回调。因为您不知道已经建立了多少个回调函数，也不知道用户系统有多忙，所以您不知道您的回调函数将运行的频率（除非您指定了 timeout 。否则无法保证每个通过事件循环（甚至每个屏幕更新周期）将包括正在执行的任何空闲回调；如果事件循环使用了所有可用时间，那么您就不走运了（再次，除非您使用了 timeout ）。

trans-unit.source: Use timeouts when you need to, but only when you need to. Using timeouts can ensure that your code runs in a timely manner, but it can also allow you to cause lag or animation stutters by mandating that the browser call you when there's not enough time left for you to run without disrupting performance.
trans-unit.target: 在需要时使用超时，但仅在需要时使用。使用超时可以确保您的代码及时运行，但也可以通过强制浏览器在没有足够的时间运行时调用浏览器来调用您，从而导致延迟或动画停顿，而不会影响性能。

trans-unit.source: Varyings are variables that are declared by the vertex shader and used to pass data from the vertex shader to the fragment shader. This is commonly used to share a vertex's normal vector after it has been computed by the vertex shader.
trans-unit.target: Varyings是由顶点着色器声明和使用从所述顶点着色器对片段着色器传递数据的变量。在顶点着色器计算出顶点的法线向量后，通常将其共享。

trans-unit.target: 验证用户提供的信息是否导致有效的交易。这导致创建并返回特定于付款方式的对象，该对象包含处理交易所需的信息。

Also, note that most browsers (notably Firefox 8+) do not allow connections to insecure WebSocket servers from secure pages.

trans-unit.source: Web Video Text Tracks Format (WebVTT) is a format for displaying timed text tracks (such as subtitles or captions) using the <track> element. The primary purpose of WebVTT files is to add text overlays to a <video>. WebVTT is a text based format, which must be encoded using UTF-8. Where you can use spaces you can also use tabs. There is also a small API available to represent and manage these tracks and the data needed to perform the playback of the text at the correct times.
trans-unit.target: Web视频文本轨道格式（WebVTT）是一种用于使用 <track> 元素显示定时文本轨道（例如字幕或标题）的格式。 WebVTT文件的主要目的是将文本叠加层添加到 <video> 。 WebVTT是基于文本的格式，必须使用UTF-8进行编码。您可以在其中使用空格的地方也可以使用制表符。还有一个小的API可用来表示和管理这些音轨以及在正确的时间执行文本播放所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: Web Workers makes it possible to run a script operation in a background thread separate from the main execution thread of a web application. The advantage of this is that laborious processing can be performed in a separate thread, allowing the main (usually the UI) thread to run without being blocked/slowed down.
trans-unit.target: Web Workers使得可以在与Web应用程序的主执行线程分开的后台线程中运行脚本操作。这样做的优点是可以在单独的线程中执行费力的处理，从而允许主线程（通常是UI）运行而不会被阻塞/减速。

trans-unit.source: WebGL 1: The OES_vertex_array_object extension allows you to use vertex array objects in a WebGL 1 context.
trans-unit.target: WebGL的1：该 OES_vertex_array_object 扩展允许您在一个WebGL的1上下文中使用顶点数组对象。

trans-unit.source: WebRTC (Web Real-Time Communications) is a technology which enables Web applications and sites to capture and optionally stream audio and/or video media, as well as to exchange arbitrary data between browsers without requiring an intermediary. The set of standards that comprises WebRTC makes it possible to share data and perform teleconferencing peer-to-peer, without requiring that the user install plug-ins or any other third-party software.
trans-unit.target: WebRTC（Web实时通信）是一项使Web应用程序和站点能够捕获和可选地传输音频和/或视频媒体，以及在不需要中介程序的情况下在浏览器之间交换任意数据的技术。包含WebRTC的标准集使共享数据和执行对等电话会议成为可能，而无需用户安装插件或任何其他第三方软件。

trans-unit.source: Workers run in another global context, DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope, different from the current window. By default, methods and properties of Window are not available to them, but DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope, like Window, implements WindowTimers and WindowBase64.
trans-unit.target: 工作程序在另一个全局上下文 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope 中运行，与当前窗口不同。默认情况下， Window 的方法和属性不可用，但是 DedicatedWorkerGlobalScope （例如 Window ）实现 WindowTimers 和 WindowBase64 。

trans-unit.source: normal vector: We need to store the X, Y and Z components of the normal vector, but since precision is not that important, we use 8-bit signed integers. For better performance, we align the data to 32 bits by also storing a fourth zero-valued component, bringing the total size to 4 bytes. Also, we tell WebGL to normalize the values because our normals are always in range [-1, 1].
trans-unit.target: 法线向量：我们需要存储法线向量的X，Y和Z分量，但是由于精度并不那么重要，因此我们使用8位有符号整数。为了获得更好的性能，我们还通过存储第四个零值分量将数据对齐为32位，从而使总大小为4个字节。另外，我们告诉WebGL对值进行归一化，因为我们的法线始终在[-1，1]范围内。

trans-unit.source: A ConstrainDouble describing the acceptable or required value(s) for a video track's aspect ratio. The value is the width divided by the height and is rounded to ten decimal places. For example, the standard high-definition video aspect ratio of 16:9 can be computed as 1920/1080, or 1.7777777778.
trans-unit.target: 甲 ConstrainDouble 描述用于一个视频轨迹的宽高比的可接受的或所需的值（一个或多个）。该值是宽度除以高度，并四舍五入到小数点后十位。例如，可以将16：9的标准高清视频宽高比计算为1920/1080或1.7777777778。

trans-unit.source: A ConstrainDouble describing the acceptable or required value(s) for a video track's frame rate, in frames per second.
trans-unit.target: 甲 ConstrainDouble 描述用于视频轨道的帧速率的可接受的或所要求的值（一个或多个），以每秒帧数。

trans-unit.source: A ConstrainDouble describing the acceptable or required value(s) for an audio track's latency, with values specified in seconds. In audio processing, latency is the time between the start of processing (when sound occurs in the real world, or is generated by a hardware device) and the data being made available to the next step in the audio input or output process. In most cases, low latency is desirable for performance and user experience purposes, but when power consumption is a concern, or delays are otherwise acceptable, higher latency might be acceptable.
trans-unit.target: 甲 ConstrainDouble 描述用于音频轨迹的延迟的可接受的或所需的值（一个或多个）中，用秒为单位指定的值。在音频处理中，等待时间是指从开始处理（声音在现实世界中发生或由硬件设备生成）到数据可用于音频输入或输出过程中的下一个步骤之间的时间。在大多数情况下，低延迟对于性能和用户体验目的是理想的，但是当功耗是一个问题，或者延迟是可以接受的时，较高的延迟可能是可以接受的。

trans-unit.source: A ConstrainDouble describing the acceptable or required value(s) for an audio track's volume, on a linear scale where 0.0 means silence and 1.0 is the highest supported volume.
trans-unit.target: 甲 ConstrainDouble 描述用于音频轨迹的音量的可接受的或所需的值（一个或多个），以线性刻度其中0.0表示沉默和1.0是支持的最高体积。

trans-unit.source: A DOMException describing the error represented by the event. The error's error property's value may be any exception that makes sense during the handling of media recording, including these specifically identified by the specification. The descriptions here are generic ones; you'll find more specific ones to various scenarios in which they may occur in the corresponding method references.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMException 描述由事件所表示的错误。错误的 error 属性的值可以是在处理媒体记录期间有意义的任何异常，包括规范中明确指出的异常。这里的描述是通用的；您会在相应的方法引用中找到针对各种情况的更具体的情况。

trans-unit.source: A DOMException that describes the error that occurred. This object's name property should indicate the name of the error that occurred. The other fields may or may not be present.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMException 描述所发生的错误。该对象的 name 属性应指示发生的错误的名称。其他字段可能存在也可能不存在。

trans-unit.source: A DOMException with a value of INDEX_SIZE_ERR is thrown if the specified offset is negative or is greater than the number of 16-bit units in the node's text; a DOMException with a value of NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR is thrown if the node is read only.
trans-unit.target: 甲 DOMException 具有值 INDEX_SIZE_ERR 如果指定偏移量，则抛出为负或比在节点的文本的16位单元的数量更大; 如果该节点是只读的，则抛出一个值为 NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR 的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMException with the value NO_MODIFICATION_ERR is thrown if one of the text nodes being replaced is read only.
trans-unit.target: 一 DOMException 与价值 NO_MODIFICATION_ERR 如果文本节点中的一个被替换为只读被抛出。

trans-unit.source: A DOMException.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: A QuotaExceededErrorDOMException is thrown if the requested length is greater than 65536 bytes.
trans-unit.target: 甲 QuotaExceededError DOMException 如果所请求的长度大于65536个字节的被抛出。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately after the browser receives the first byte of the response from the server.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器从服务器接收到响应的第一个字节后立即提供 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately after the browser receives the last byte of the resource or immediately before the transport connection is closed, whichever comes first.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器收到资源的最后一个字节之后或在传输连接关闭之前（以先到者为准）的 DOMHighResTimeStamp 。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately before the browser starts the domain name lookup for the resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 之前的浏览器启动域名查找的资源。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately before the browser starts to establish the connection to the server to retrieve the resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 之前的浏览器开始建立连接到服务器，以获取资源。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp immediately before the browser starts to fetch the resource.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 之前的浏览器开始获取资源。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp object.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 对象。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the duration of the performance entry. If the duration concept doesn't apply for a particular performance metric, the browser may choose to return a duration of 0.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 代表的持续 performance entry 。如果持续时间概念不适用于特定的性能指标，则浏览器可以选择返回持续时间0。

trans-unit.source: A DOMHighResTimeStamp representing the first timestamp when the performance entry was created.
trans-unit.target: 一个 DOMHighResTimeStamp 表示，当第一时间戳 performance entry 已创建。
